Package com.vmware.vapi.server.cert.impl

Class CertificateCacheImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.server.cert.impl.CertificateCacheImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CertificateCache, java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.security.cert.X509Certificate[]>>
    public final class CertificateCacheImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CertificateCache
    Thread-safe implementation of CertificateCache built upon Supplier of fresh certificates.

    The cache is initialized lazily on first call to get() or refresh().

    This cache combines concurrent refresh calls in a single call to Supplier.get(), in order to reduce the load on the certificate provider.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CertificateCacheImpl

        public CertificateCacheImpl​(java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.security.cert.X509Certificate[]>> freshCertSupplier)
        Creates a cache which uses the given Supplier to fetch certificates.

        The Supplier must fetch fresh certificates from the certificate provider on every Supplier.get(), e.g. call the sso.admin.ConfigurationManagementService.getIssuersCertificates() SOAP API or Certificate Management SigningCertificate.get() vAPI or JWKS endpoint.

        Parameters:
        freshCertSupplier - mechanism to fetch fresh certificates. Will be invoked to populate the cache and on every refresh. Must not cache results. Must not be null. The Supplier must not return null CompletionStage nor null certificate array nor null certificates.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.security.cert.X509Certificate[]> get()
        Description copied from interface: CertificateCache

        The returned CompletionStage must not be null. The returned array must not be null and must not contain null elements.

        Specified by:
        get in interface CertificateCache
        Specified by:
        get in interface java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.security.cert.X509Certificate[]>>

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Description copied from interface: CertificateCache
        Starts refresh of the cache. When this method exits, refresh could still be running. After this method exits, all subsequent calls to CertificateCache.get() must return the refreshed certificates.
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface CertificateCache
